DOC.brief_summary: The investigator perform 12-week , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled human trial evaluate efficacy safety Fermented Velvet Antler extract fatigue recovery exercise . The investigator measure fatigue recovery parameter , include lactate , ammonia , inorganic phosphorus , creatine kinase LDH , monitor blood pressure .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Fermented Velvet Antler Extract Fatigue Recovery After Exercise
DOC.criteria: Males female 1960 year old Hemoglobin concentration 13 14 g/dL ( men ) , 12 13 g/dL ( woman ) Able give inform consent Allergic hypersensitive ingredient test product History reaction test product gastrointestinal disease Crohn 's disease gastrointestinal surgery Participation clinical trial within past 2 month Laboratory test , medical psychological condition deem investigator interfere successful participation study Pregnant lactate woman etc .
